description:
Big snowdrifts have nothing on these tall boots. Plenty of insulation and a cozy fleece collar keep feet warm while hiking, snowshoeing or shoveling snow. Aggressively lugged, winter-specific rubber soles provide traction in winter terrain.LWG-certified leather and synthetic upper.Keen.Dry waterproof-breathable membrane keeps feet dry.200g Keen.Warm insulation is made from recycled P.E.T.Wicking liner with antimicrobial treatment resists odours.Dual-density EVA midsole cushions underfoot.Keen.Freeze rubber outsole grips snow and ice.

        Sustainability









                      Leather Working Group leather














                      Recycled content
name: Keen Greta Tall Waterproof Winter Boots - Women's
